§ 40108. Duty to maintain tax-exempt status The corporation shall maintain its status as an organization exempt from taxation under the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 (26 U.S.C. 1 et seq.). (Pub. L. 105–225, Aug. 12, 1998, 112 Stat. 1330.)
